meta.title: MITRE ATT&CK for ICS to NIST 800-53 Mitigation Linkages
meta.description: Maps MITRE ICS mitigations to corresponding NIST SP 800-53 Rev 5 controls. Used to populate ot_mappings and mitre_technique_mitigations.ot_requirement_id.
sources: MITRE ATT&CK for ICS mitigation descriptions and scope
NIST SP 800-82 Rev 3 ICS overlay mappings
meta.confidence_basis: Mappings derived from mitigation descriptions and NIST control scope alignment. Confidence 0.80 reflects cross-framework mapping.
